format:
<style>
    .def p.value {
       color: #4a8ad9;
    }
    .big p.value {
        vertical-align: bottom;
        font-size: 150%;
        color: #4a8ad9;
    }
    .big p.label {
        vertical-align: top;
        font-weight: bold;
    }
    .huge p.value {
        vertical-align: bottom;
        font-size: 200%;
        color: #4a8ad9;
    }
    .huge p.label {
        vertical-align: top;
        font-weight: bold;
    }
</style>

name: active connections
connections max
varnish uptime
global functions
set global version
func:
global.set("version", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: UUID (object)
func:
msg.payload = { "uuid": msg.payload.replace(/\n+$/, '')};
return msg;

name: init mgr addr
func:
msg.payload = global.get('MGR_ADDR_CFG') || env.get('VCACHE_MGR_ADDR') || '';
return msg;

name: mgr addr cfg
func:
global.set('MGR_ADDR_CFG', msg.payload);
return msg;

name: minion tmpl cmd
set mgr cfg
stop mgr agent
func:
msg.stop = true;
return msg;

name: start mgr agent
func:
msg.start =  true;
return msg;

name: init mgr agent key
func:
msg.payload = global.get('MGR_KEY_CFG') || env.get('VCACHE_MGR_KEY') || '';
return msg;

name: mgr agent key cfg
func:
global.set('MGR_KEY_CFG', msg.payload);
return msg;

name: minion key cmd
restart mgr agent
